summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: N3 No Name Necessary Pore-Minimizing Mattifying Oil and Shine Control Anti-aging Makeup Face Primer Spray (200ml) Review Date: 2019/07/16 Store: No Name Necessary Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'No Name Necessary', 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Package Information': 'Bottle', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Specialty': 'Mattifying', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7.5 inches; 8.78 Ounces'} Review Text: Coming from a total Makeup Klutz, this product is - fantastic??!
I don't always wear foundation or pressed powder or anything to cover everything, but I really should.
Had an event on Sat. that I stepped it up for & tried this... long story short, IT WORKS.
I washed & lotioned my face as usual, then waited an hour or so to let it totally absorb.
Sprayed this & let it dry.
Applied a cream foundation that I've used before but, this time, it seemed to spread more evenly & easily and it looked really smooth & nice!
Received husband compliments & girlfriends at event compliments!
Whatever the magic is in this spray bottle, I'll be sure to keep it on hand. Review Title: Amazing stuff! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Review Date: 2021/03/31 Store: Argan Magic Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} Review Text: My daughter has long, thick hair that she colors a few shades darker than her own & is always looking for products to keep it healthy.
And this hair mask is a winner!
The fragrance is a vague salon-type scent that’s pleasant but not overpowering. The amount of hair she has takes a lot of this, but WOW - you can see the results - her hair is very shiny & soft. It doesn’t have that cheap conditioner greasy softness - it’s a nice, swingy softness. Moroccan argan oil is the secret!
At nearly $18 for 8 oz., it’s a pricey treat but also worth it.

Thank you for taking the time to read this & I hope it’s helpful! Review Title: Help for color-treated hair? Yes & thank you! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Burt's Bees Baby Bath Time Kit with Ultra Gentle Lotion, Bubble Bath, Foaming Shampoo & Wash, Nourishing Baby Oil, and Face & Hand Cloths Review Date: 2021/06/24 Store: Burt's Bees Product Description: ['Babies deserve a fresh start in life with ingredients from nature that are gentle for their delicate skin. Experience our most popular natural Burts Bees Baby products together in one. Our gentle, effective and natural baby products cleanse, soften and help moisturize babys precious skin safely and naturally. Its easy to make bath time fun with the mild, tear-free bubble bath, then simply cleanse with the foaming 2-in-1 baby shampoo and body wash. Finish by moisturizing with ultra gentle lotion and nourishing baby oil to keep skin soft and fresh. A pack of face and hand cloths is handy for on-the-go cleansing. These baby care essentials are pediatrician tested, gentle enough to use every day and formulated without parabens, phthalates, SLS, petrolatum or synthetic fragrances, so you can feel good about caring for babys delicate skin. This new baby gift basket is a sweet gift for any baby shower occasion.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': "Burt's Bees", 'Scent': 'See Individual Packaging', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Dimensions': '11.5 x 6.44 x 3.19 inches; 3.13 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'TU_33789', 'UPC': '792850911796', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/BURBP'} Review Text: If you’re a Burt’s Bees fan, you’ll appreciate this boxed set.
It’s full of full-sized quality goodies packed perfectly in a sturdy box which makes it convenient to gift.
(ALSO: you don’t have to be a baby to use these! I have every intention of using them all on my almost 60 yr old self because I like their products for my very sensitive skin.)

At a little over $8/per piece, they’re priced at full retail, but you are paying for the convenience of boxed selections.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Very giftable with a nice selection of quality products! You pay for the boxed convenience… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown) Review Date: 2021/07/01 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: Full disclosure: I’m a makeup klutz who has no business posting a pic of eyebrows BUT — for the 1st time, I found a product that let me actually draw some in!
My brows never fully grew back after chemo in 2005, so I’ve just learned to love my sparse & whispy nothings.
This pen, though, is pretty goof proof! I think it’s the way the end is shaped with 4 little tips similar to a fork… the lines that come out aren’t thick & bold, but they can be if you just keep drawing over & over.

My daughter is a brow fill-in champ, so I will definitely have her help me next time she’s home but, in the meantime, I will recommend this product since if I can use it, anyone can!
I’m timid about big dark brows, but will try a little more each day. At just under $10, it’s a great value for an excellent product.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Makeup klutz me can actually use this! Very easy to apply & draw… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz Review Date: 2021/07/29 Store: PROOT Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: I ordered this for my daughter who spends a lot of time in the gym, so fitted workout clothes + sweat + misc. dirt = back breakouts!
This spray not only feels good going on, but it has helped her flare ups considerably after using it for a week after each shower (2x/day).

The design allows it to spray out at all angles which is important to reach your back if there isn’t anyone to help you with it.
There’s no downside - it feels good, there’s no funky residue, it has reduced the redness & inflammation, & it’s easy to use.
Definitely recommend & will order again!

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: You can actually reach your back with this! 1 week use & it looks much improved… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BeautyGARDE MAGIC Charcoal Facial Cleanser - detoxifying and anti-pollution face cleanser, Nonie Creme Review Date: 2021/08/22 Store: BeautyGARDE Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 2.13 x 7.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'UPC': '856365007242'} Review Text: The scrubber tip on this tube of cleanser sounded like a great idea, so I ordered it. I’ve used charcoal face products on my very dry, sensitive skin in the past with no irritation or reaction & this one is fine, too. Cleans, rinses well, moisturizes a bit.

BUT — the angled tip has teeny nylon bristles that are actually too short. You squeeze the tube to push some product onto the surface & gently “scrub” your face with it. The problem is that the bristles are so short that it just feels like a plastic disc massage! No matter how gently or firmly I applied it, the result was the same - rubbing creamy gray cleanser across my face with a circle of hard plastic.

In theory, this idea is good but the actual design of the tip does not work for me.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Scrubber feature is better in theory than in practice - NOPE! Cleanser is fine… Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Review Date: 2021/09/28 Store: Kea Health Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: I have super dry skin in general & go through creams & lotions Iike crazy, always looking for the perfect one.
This one? WOW - is it ever super moisturizing.

On my hands, I can rub it in for several minutes & it feels really creamy like a good massage cream. The lanolin must be what makes this happen & the olive oil must be the reason my skin is glistening afterwards. If I need to do something right away, I do wipe my palms off a bit but, at night I’ve been rubbing this in & leaving it to soak in all night.
On my feet, I rub this on my heels & balls of my feet after a late shower, then cover them with comfy socks & let this soak in all night.
Next morning? New hands, new feet! They feel great.

Manuka honey is known for its effectiveness in treating skin issues due to its antibacterial properties, so the combination of this, along with the other ingredients makes this an instant favorite in my book.
A little goes a long way & the price is very reasonable for the excellent quality.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: OUTSTANDING cream that glides on & leaves you glistening… my hands & feet LOVE it! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Squalane + Cucumber Rapid Eye Lift Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness, Peptide-Complex Infused - 0.4 oz Review Date: 2021/10/26 Store: Skin Set Go Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Skin Set Go', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Item Volume': '0.4 Fluid Ounces'} Review Text: I’d rather pay less for this eye cream & have it come in a simple tube with a narrow tip to just squeeze out a little at a time.
The syringe seems like much ado about nothing - I mean, it’s just a way of squeezing out a little cream, too! Except it’s a lot of packaging & fuss. Once the cream is gone, there’s no way to open this up & get all the rest out from inside the container like you can do with tubes.

Besides that, the cream itself is great!
No scent whatsoever, it glides on smoothly & easily, and it absorbs quickly & completely.
It’s nice to find an under eye cream you can use in the morning before applying concealer. I also have been applying at night after I wash my face & my under eye skin area looks & feels moisturized in the morning.

So — 5 stars for the cream, 3 stars for the silly syringe brings me to 4 stars overall.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** 🤗 Review Title: The cream is great! The syringe dispenser? Unnecessary… Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Darnlight LED Light Therapy Mask - 7 Color LED Face Mask Light Therapy Facial Treatment - Blue & Red Light Therapy Mask for Acne Fine Lines Wrinkles & Rosacea Review Date: 2021/11/29 Store: Darnlight Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Darnlight', 'Item Form': 'Pads', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 7.9 x 5.7 inches; 3.57 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'D-1'} Review Text: I can honestly say that I've given this thing a try.
I've had it for nearly a month now & have tried all the colors on a regular basis and... the jury is still out here.

Maybe I started too late? Maybe my very dry, very sensitive, sun damaged 60 year old skin is past redemption?
I'm not quite sure, but the improvement is - negligible?? Imperceptible??
I clean my face, wear the mask, moisturize, & wait. A couple times/week for a couple of weeks now.
I think part of my problem is that I don't find the process relaxing. Having lights on my face & having to sit still. My hyper tendencies kick in & I get squirmy and anxious.
I also have a large size head, so the face mask is pretty snug. Rather torturous, actually.

So -- as far as the review goes -- the product is fine. It does as it says it will, apparently. I'm just not the target audience! I'll share it with my smaller headed, more low key sister.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it's Helpful!** Review Title: Maybe I'm not the ideal customer? Just not a great experience... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

(ALSO: you don’t have to be a baby to use these! I have every intention of using them all on my almost 60 yr old self because I like their products for my very sensitive skin.)

At a little over $8/per piece, they’re priced at full retail, but you are paying for the convenience of boxed selections.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Very giftable with a nice selection of quality products! You pay for the boxed convenience… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Eyebrow Tattoo Pen, Waterproof brow Pencil, Microblading Brow Pen, Natural Looking, Long Lasting (1# Light Brown) Review Date: 2021/07/01 Store: EINHOOM Average Rating: 2.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'EINHOOM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 0.79 x 0.75 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} Review Text: Full disclosure: I’m a makeup klutz who has no business posting a pic of eyebrows BUT — for the 1st time, I found a product that let me actually draw some in!
My brows never fully grew back after chemo in 2005, so I’ve just learned to love my sparse & whispy nothings.
This pen, though, is pretty goof proof! I think it’s the way the end is shaped with 4 little tips similar to a fork… the lines that come out aren’t thick & bold, but they can be if you just keep drawing over & over.

My daughter is a brow fill-in champ, so I will definitely have her help me next time she’s home but, in the meantime, I will recommend this product since if I can use it, anyone can!
I’m timid about big dark brows, but will try a little more each day. At just under $10, it’s a great value for an excellent product.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Makeup klutz me can actually use this! Very easy to apply & draw… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Back Acne Treatment Spray | Bacne Cure Treatment Spray | Clears Back Acne, Body Acne, Chest Acne, Butt Acne, Ingrown Hairs & Razor Bumps | Formulated with Natural Ingredients, Cruelty-free | 5.1 oz Review Date: 2021/07/29 Store: PROOT Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'mist', 'Brand': 'PROOT', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Item Volume': '5.1 Fluid Ounces', 'Product Dimensions': '1.7 x 1.7 x 7 inches; 7.48 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Choice Cosmetics Co.,Ltd'} Review Text: I ordered this for my daughter who spends a lot of time in the gym, so fitted workout clothes + sweat + misc. dirt = back breakouts!
This spray not only feels good going on, but it has helped her flare ups considerably after using it for a week after each shower (2x/day).

The design allows it to spray out at all angles which is important to reach your back if there isn’t anyone to help you with it.
There’s no downside - it feels good, there’s no funky residue, it has reduced the redness & inflammation, & it’s easy to use.
Definitely recommend & will order again!

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: You can actually reach your back with this! 1 week use & it looks much improved… Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: BeautyGARDE MAGIC Charcoal Facial Cleanser - detoxifying and anti-pollution face cleanser, Nonie Creme Review Date: 2021/08/22 Store: BeautyGARDE Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 2.13 x 7.75 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1201', 'UPC': '856365007242'} Review Text: The scrubber tip on this tube of cleanser sounded like a great idea, so I ordered it. I’ve used charcoal face products on my very dry, sensitive skin in the past with no irritation or reaction & this one is fine, too. Cleans, rinses well, moisturizes a bit.

BUT — the angled tip has teeny nylon bristles that are actually too short. You squeeze the tube to push some product onto the surface & gently “scrub” your face with it. The problem is that the bristles are so short that it just feels like a plastic disc massage! No matter how gently or firmly I applied it, the result was the same - rubbing creamy gray cleanser across my face with a circle of hard plastic.

In theory, this idea is good but the actual design of the tip does not work for me.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: Scrubber feature is better in theory than in practice - NOPE! Cleanser is fine… Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Kea Health Manuka Honey Moisturizer Cream - For Cracked Hands and Feet - Eczema and Psoriasis Treatment - Anti Itch Relief for Dry Skin - With Lanolin and Olive Oil Review Date: 2021/09/28 Store: Kea Health Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kea Health', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '7.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Hands, Feet', 'Package Dimensions': '2.95 x 2.91 x 2.72 inches; 8.15 Ounces'} Review Text: I have super dry skin in general & go through creams & lotions Iike crazy, always looking for the perfect one.
This one? WOW - is it ever super moisturizing.

On my hands, I can rub it in for several minutes & it feels really creamy like a good massage cream. The lanolin must be what makes this happen & the olive oil must be the reason my skin is glistening afterwards. If I need to do something right away, I do wipe my palms off a bit but, at night I’ve been rubbing this in & leaving it to soak in all night.
On my feet, I rub this on my heels & balls of my feet after a late shower, then cover them with comfy socks & let this soak in all night.
Next morning? New hands, new feet! They feel great.

Manuka honey is known for its effectiveness in treating skin issues due to its antibacterial properties, so the combination of this, along with the other ingredients makes this an instant favorite in my book.
A little goes a long way & the price is very reasonable for the excellent quality.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** Review Title: OUTSTANDING cream that glides on & leaves you glistening… my hands & feet LOVE it! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Squalane + Cucumber Rapid Eye Lift Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness, Peptide-Complex Infused - 0.4 oz Review Date: 2021/10/26 Store: Skin Set Go Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Skin Set Go', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Item Volume': '0.4 Fluid Ounces'} Review Text: I’d rather pay less for this eye cream & have it come in a simple tube with a narrow tip to just squeeze out a little at a time.
The syringe seems like much ado about nothing - I mean, it’s just a way of squeezing out a little cream, too! Except it’s a lot of packaging & fuss. Once the cream is gone, there’s no way to open this up & get all the rest out from inside the container like you can do with tubes.

Besides that, the cream itself is great!
No scent whatsoever, it glides on smoothly & easily, and it absorbs quickly & completely.
It’s nice to find an under eye cream you can use in the morning before applying concealer. I also have been applying at night after I wash my face & my under eye skin area looks & feels moisturized in the morning.

So — 5 stars for the cream, 3 stars for the silly syringe brings me to 4 stars overall.

**Thank you for reading my review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** 🤗 Review Title: The cream is great! The syringe dispenser? Unnecessary… Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Darnlight LED Light Therapy Mask - 7 Color LED Face Mask Light Therapy Facial Treatment - Blue & Red Light Therapy Mask for Acne Fine Lines Wrinkles & Rosacea Review Date: 2021/11/29 Store: Darnlight Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Darnlight', 'Item Form': 'Pads', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '7', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 7.9 x 5.7 inches; 3.57 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'D-1'} Review Text: I can honestly say that I've given this thing a try.
I've had it for nearly a month now & have tried all the colors on a regular basis and... the jury is still out here.

Maybe I started too late? Maybe my very dry, very sensitive, sun damaged 60 year old skin is past redemption?
I'm not quite sure, but the improvement is - negligible?? Imperceptible??
I clean my face, wear the mask, moisturize, & wait. A couple times/week for a couple of weeks now.
I think part of my problem is that I don't find the process relaxing. Having lights on my face & having to sit still. My hyper tendencies kick in & I get squirmy and anxious.
I also have a large size head, so the face mask is pretty snug. Rather torturous, actually.

So -- as far as the review goes -- the product is fine. It does as it says it will, apparently. I'm just not the target audience! I'll share it with my smaller headed, more low key sister.

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it's Helpful!** Review Title: Maybe I'm not the ideal customer? Just not a great experience... Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Product Type:** Favorable inclination towards **beauty and skincare** products including moisturizers, cleansers, makeup primers, hair treatments, and baby care items.

2. **Ingredients:** Strong preference for products that are **natural, cruelty-free, and paraben-free**, highlighting a concern for ingredient safety and ethical sourcing.

3. **Efficacy Focus:** Consistently drawn to products that offer **specific benefits** such as **hydration**, **shine control**, and **skin health**, demonstrating a desire for effective solutions.

4. **Target Demographics:** Purchases range from personal use to products for family (especially children), indicating a dual focus on **self-care and family-oriented care**.

5. **User Experience:** Values products that are easy to use, with an emphasis on **ease of application** and **positive sensory experiences** (e.g., pleasant fragrances, smooth textures).

6. **Improvement and Results:** Demonstrates a strong interest in products that deliver noticeable **results or fixes** for common issues like back acne, dry skin, and makeup application.

7. **Review Behavior:** Engages in detailed **review writing**, providing insights on usability and results, revealing a reflective consumer approach that values sharing personal experiences for community benefit.

8. **Mixed Sentiments:** Shows a blend of satisfaction and critique towards product designs and effectiveness, with some disappointment noted in certain products, indicating a discerning consumer attitude.

target_interaction.title: An excellent eye cream that passes my “tests”! First, do no harm…
target_interaction.text:
Forever in search of the perfect skin care products, I ordered this eye cream.
I always try it on the back of my hand first to see what it feels like & what it smells like - it’s very creamy but not thick & has no odor at all.
Then I dot some on my forehead to see how it absorbs & how it dries & to make sure there’s no reaction on my very dry & sensitive skin - it’s very light & dries quickly. Leaves a bit of stickiness that dissipates.
Finally I dot the cream all over my undereye area & hope for the best!

In this case, it’s great. I’ve been using it for several days now at night after a shower & again in the morning before makeup.
I really don’t expect all the magical things to happen that are listed on eye creams, so suffice to say it’s moisturizing, it spreads easily, & my undereye area feels soft & smooth after using.
All good!

**Thank you for reading this review & I hope that it’s Helpful!** 👀
target_interaction.title_meta: facetheory Ocuwake Eye Cream EYE1 - Eye Cream For Dark Circles And Puffiness, Vitamin C Eye Brightening Cream, Vegan and Cruelty-Free, Made in the UK | Unfragranced | 1.0 fl oz
features: [ Anti Wrinkle Eye Cream ] Help reduce the appearance of wrinkles and eye bags with Meiview, which encourages the production of collagen I, targeting loss of elasticity, leaving skin smoother.
[ Vegan Eye Repair Cream ] Powerful actives like chamomile extract and argan oil, Ocuwake Eye Cream is formulated to firm the eye contour and protect elasticity, reducing the appearance of eye bags.
[ Eye Cream For Dark Circles and Puffiness ] By inhibiting melanin production, Hexylresorcinol helps to reduce the appearance of undereye dark circles and puffiness in the under-eye area.
[ Lightweight Texture ] Can be used morning and night, apply a small amount after cleansing under eyes with a gentle tapping motion. A fast-absorbing formula that can be worn alone or under makeup.
[ Cruelty-Free & Manufactured in the UK ] Facetheory is Leaping Bunny-certified cruelty-free. Our products contain no parabens, silicones, PEGS, SLS, SLES, or mineral oils.
